#summary How to build project from sources

= Prerequisites =
 # JDK 1.6+
 # Maven [2.0.9,> 

= Steps =
 # Download sources from http://gwt-youtube-api.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ or specific tag
 # Add following URL as your [http://maven.apache.org/settings.html release repository] in settings.xml file http://gwt-youtube-api.googlecode.com/svn/releases-repository
{{{
<profiles>
    <profile>
      ...
      <repositories>
        <repository>
          <id>YouTubeReleases</id>
          <url>http://gwt-youtube-api.googlecode.com/svn/releases-repository</url>
          <snapshots>
             <enabled>false</enabled>
          </snapshots>
	</repository>
      </repositories>
      ...
    </profile>
</profiles>
}}}
 # run {{{mvn clean install}}}
 # run {{{mvn eclipse:clean eclipse:eclipse}}} in order to create eclipse projects
 # import existing project into eclipse
